txt.en: 'Thank you -- Shulgolb told me what you were up to. We can finally get started!\n\n'Now, where did I put my....'
You've helped Shulgolb collect enough ingredients.\n\nYou should talk to him at Kafagur.
Without the right ingredients, Shulgolb's and Uzhún's cooking plans are in a spot of trouble.
Complete two tasks for Shulgolb at Kafagur.

'Thanks for gettin' us out of Gundabad. It's nicer here, and I don't have to fight anymore. I just help Uzhún cook food!

'Though, times have been tough lately. We wanted to cook something to improve morale, but Uzhún forgot to ask the hunters to gather ingredients again. Now there aren't enough hunters to help. I'd go myself, but... I don't think I'm ready for that.

'Would you mind helpin' us one more time?'

'Think Uzhún'll want to get their hands on these ingredients and start cookin'.\n\n'Bring the ingredients over to 'em, would you? It's only right -- after all, you're the one who did the hard work, not me.'
Shulgolb has given you the ingredients that Uzhún requires.\n\nUzhún can be found at Kafagur.
